site.title: AG Sutura Couture - Salo tare da mutunci
site.description: Ginin dinki na musamman a Niamey

hero.title: Fasahar dinki mai daidaito
hero.subtitle: Ginin dinki na musamman a Niamey
hero.description: Ƙirƙirar tufafi na gargajiya da na zamani, gyare-gyare masu daidaito da sabis na musamman don haɓaka salonku tare da kyakkyawa da mutunci.

about.title: Game da gininmu
about.subtitle: AG Sutura Couture
about.description: Wanda Abdoul-Ghaffar ya kafa, gininmu yana wakiltar ƙwararrun dinki a Niamey. Tare da sha'awa da daidaito, muna canza zane zuwa ayyukan fasaha masu kyau.

values.excellence_desc: Daidaito da inganci a kowane ɗinki
values.passion_desc: Ƙaunar sana'a da aikin da aka yi da kyau
values.elegance_desc: Salo da mutunci a kowane ƙirƙira

services.title: Ayyukanmu
services.subtitle: Magunguna na musamman ga kowane buƙata

custom.title: Dinki na musamman
custom.description: Ƙirƙirar tufafi na musamman waɗanda suka dace da jikinku da salonku.

alterations.title: Gyare-gyare da daidaitawa
alterations.description: Gyara da canza tufafinku don daidaitaccen siffa.

traditional.title: Tufafin gargajiya
traditional.description: Ƙira na tufafin al'adu tare da girmama al'adu da zamani.

professional.title: Tufafin sana'a
professional.description: Ƙirƙirar riguna da tufafin aiki masu kyau da aiki.

gallery.title: Ayyukanmu
gallery.subtitle: Gano ƙwararrun aikinmu
gallery.cta: Kuna da aiki na musamman a zuciyarku?
